nodes.text: Kal'Shebbol was a planet located within the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It was located close to one end of the Rimma Trade Route, which connected it to the planet Karideph. Cal Alder, an Alliance to Restore the Republic lieutenant, hailed from the planet.

Kal'Shebbol first appeared in "The Saga Begins" in The DarkStryder Campaign, which was written by Timothy Zahn and released in 1995. The world was then mentioned in canon in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game released by Fantasy Flight Games on August 4, 2016.
